verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Aleluya aleluya, aleluya. x2
(Aleluya aleluya,
aleluya aleluya. Aleluya
aleluya, aleluya). x2

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Mungu nirehemu mimi,
nirehemu, sawasawa na
fadhili zako Bwana.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Kwa rehema zako Bwana,
uyafute makosa yangu
ee Bwana nitakate.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Nioshe kabisa Bwana,
na uovu, nitakase dhambi
zangu Bwana wangu.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Nakiri makosa yangu,
Bwana wangu,
nimekukosea wewe
Bwana wangu.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Niumbie moyo safi,
moyo safi, usinitupe
ee Bwana mbali nawe.
